Event.name: Surrendering
Event.definition: <def-root>In this frame a <fen>Fugitive</fen> presents himself or herself to the <fen>Authorities</fen> to be subject to the criminal process. <ex> <fex name="Fugitive">The bank robber</fex> <t>surrendered</t> <fex name="Authorities">to Berkeley police</fex>. </ex> <ex> <fex name="Fugitive">Norte</fex> is expected to <t>surrender</t> <fex name="Authorities">to police</fex> <fex name="Time">tomorrow</fex> <fex name="Charges">on tax fraud charges</fex> . </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Fugitive
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Fugitive</fen> is wanted by the <fen>Authorities</fen> and turns himself or herself in to the <fen>Authorities</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Authorities
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Authorities</fen> are the officials, government or otherwise, who are in charge of initiating the criminal process.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> is the location where the surrendering occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Charges
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Charges</fen> is the offense for which the <fen>Fugitive</fen> is wanted.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which the <fen>Fugitive</fen> surrenders to the <fen>Authorities</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE denotes a proposition from which the surrendering event logically follows.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: surrender.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: turn oneself into the authorities

lexUnit.name: turn in.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to surrender oneself to the authorities

lexUnit.name: give up.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: turn oneself in to the authorities
